career_labels.label: Brazilian Ministry of the Environment

career_labels.label: United Nations (UN)

career_labels.reasoning: Significant involvement in high-level UN panels and programs, demonstrating international leadership and commitment.

career_labels.reasoning: Leadership role in a major international organization, indicating significant career commitment.

career_labels.label: National Bank for Economic and Social Development (BNDES)

career_labels.label: Institute Arapyaú
career_labels.involvement: Served as a Senior Fellow, contributing to environmental and sustainability initiatives.
career_labels.reasoning: Significant involvement in a prominent research and advocacy institution, demonstrating long-term commitment.

career_labels.label: Brazilian Center for International Relations (CEBRI)
career_labels.involvement: Served as Trustee Emeritus for Environment and Climate Change, focusing on international relations and environmental policy.
career_labels.reasoning: Leadership role in a major think tank, indicating significant career commitment.

career_labels.label: International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA)
career_labels.involvement: Member of the Global Commission on the Geopolitics of Energy Transformation, contributing to global energy policy.
